reviewText: Sexy Sailor Soldier now this anime is so hot and Sexy. Besides I like how all 5 Anime Babes have Giant big Boobs

I watched Sexy Sailor Soldiers and forgot how much funnier it was then anything else of what it was intended for. The characters are cool and funny also. Shipping was fast and quick. I would recommend this product to anyone who likes funny H-series.
